title: Grand Canyon National Park: Travel by Train
body: Travel by Train       South Rim Train Service The Grand Canyon Railway offers train service between Williams, AZ (on I-40) and Grand Canyon Village.. 1-800-THE-TRAIN Train Service Amtrak (the National Railroad Passenger Corporation) offers train service from Flagstaff, AZ to points nationwide.  Reservations: (800) 872-7245 - Flagstaff Arrival/Departure times: (928) 774-8679              Arizona State Centennial Steam Train Departing Grand Canyon   Loading the player...    Transcript This video has no narration. Only the sounds from the steam locomotive. Close Transcript     Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:1 minute, 14 seconds  Arizona State Centennial Steam Train Departing Grand Canyon Village, February 14, 2012.         North Rim The North Rim of the Park may only be reached by road.  (Train tracks were never put in place to the North Rim.)
